Name: Call of the Ancient Ones
Story Background: From the depths of an ancient burial ground, a haunting call echoes across the land, summoning long-forgotten spirits to rise and wreak havoc once more upon the world of the living.
Ability: Call of the Ancient Ones allows you to return target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control. That creature gains haste until end of turn and must be sacrificed at the beginning of the next end step.
Appearance Description: The card features a ghostly apparition rising from a mystic burial ground, wreathed in an ethereal glow and exuding an aura of dread and foreboding as it is summoned to do its caller's bidding.
